# The `AssumeBuilderState` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class contain all knowledge that have been gather while building an llvm.assume and the function to manipulate it. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class contain all knowledge that have been gather while building an llvm.assume and the function to manipulate it.
